title: Do Kwon Appeal of South Korea Extradition Rejected by Montenegro Court
description: The U.S. is also seeking Kwon's extradition despite the Montenegrin court's decision to send him to South Korea.

title: Bitcoin's Halving May Be Here Sooner Than You Know (Again)
description: Several months ago, the halving was expected to take place on April 28; now it's on track to land on April 18. Blame the surge in bitcoin's price, which has attracted more mining power and sped up the network.

title: How Ubisoft, Xbox, and Blizzard Are Using AI to Make Next-Generation Games
description: UPDATED: Assassin's Creed maker Ubisoft just showcased how generative AI can power more believable NPCs. Here's how.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) bounce needs to continue
description: Bitcoin is currently bouncing after suffering Tuesday’s 8.4% reversal. Momentum indicators have reset, and now it’s just a case of $BTC getting back above the resistance at $69,000. If $BTC isn’t successful, and a lower high is made, the present correction could continue, and take the king of the cryptocurrencies even lower.

title: Leonardo AI Unveils Groundbreaking Transparency Feature for PNG Images
description: Leonardo AI emerges as a game-changer with its latest Transparency feature, revolutionizing the creation of transparent PNG files. By seamlessly integrating cutting-edge AI technology, the platform offers a hassle-free solution to the arduous task of background removal, promising users pristine images with unparalleled ease and efficiency. Simplifying image composition with transparency Leonardo AI’s Transparency feature […]

title: U.S. economy’s growth forces Fed to rethink rate cut strategy
description: The tables have turned for the U.S. economy, leaving everyone wide-eyed and bushy-tailed. Gone are the days when the U.S. was the delicate flower of the global garden, wilting without the Federal Reserve’s nurturing low rates. Recent data throws a wrench in the works, showing an economy that’s not only standing tall but also flexing […]

title: European Commission to Launch Selection Procedure for AI Office Head Following Approval of AI Act
description: The European Commission is poised to initiate the selection process for the head of its AI Office once the AI Act receives full approval, which is anticipated in May. Until then, policy units A1 and A2 in DG CONNECT will temporarily oversee the AI Office’s tasks. Establishment of the AI office Last month, on February […]

title: Microsoft Rewards on Xbox: Big Changes Ahead
description: Discover the latest updates on the Microsoft Rewards program for Xbox, including the transition to the Rewards hub.

title: Genesis Global to pay $21 million civil penalty in SEC settlement
description: Genesis Global has found itself in a bit of a pickle, agreeing to fork over a cool $21 million in civil penalties. Why, you ask? Well, it appears they’ve been a bit naughty, dabbling in the unregistered offer and sale of securities via something called the Gemini Earn program. It’s a huge price to tag […]

title: Resilient S&P 500 Hits Record Levels Despite Fed’s Rate Cut Outlook
description: Despite the Federal Reserve’s indication of an imminent end to any hopes of a rate cut in March, the S&P 500 index has shown remarkable resilience, hovering just shy of an all-time high. The disconnect between interest rates and equity markets has puzzled analysts, prompting closer scrutiny of market dynamics. Fed’s influence on market sentiment […]

title: Solana surpasses Ethereum on DEX volume amid meme coins rally
description: The Solana blockchain has supplanted Ethereum as the leader in trading volume on decentralized exchanges.

title: Ripple’s XRP eyes $1 pre-Bitcoin halving; AI altcoin set to surpass Cardano
description: Ripple's XRP is speculated to hit $1 before Bitcoin's halving event, while Borroe Finance's AI altcoin aims to outdo Cardano in performance. #partnercontent

title: USD Coin, Shiba Inu investors eye NuggetRush as market sentiment improves
description: As crypto enthusiasm rebounds, NuggetRush, a game offering real-world rewards, draws attention from USDC and SHIB investors seeking diverse assets. #partnercontent

title: New analytics widgets on Kraken Pro: Elevate your trading strategy
description:

title: Decentralized Web 3.0 Ecosystems Are Shaping a New Paradigm in Social Trading
description: Social trading has become a popular way for newbies in financial markets to make profits by simply mirroring or copying expert traders. title: BitMEX Founder Arthur Hayes Says He’s Bullish on These Three Crypto Plays for the Bull Market
description:
BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes is turning bullish on three crypto projects during the current bull market cycle.
